text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Haaaah～ Another day full of Bakushin-ness～

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ……There doesn't seem to be anyone here, is there?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Three female gods!! Do you three know who called for me!?
